text: When I notice spending triggers appearing, I recognize them and choose to pause and control spending instead.
During moments when emotions push me to spend, I notice it and choose to wait and think instead.
When I feel the pull to spend impulsively, I notice it and choose to pause and control the urge instead.
I let not being able to recognize spending triggers prevent me from controlling impulses and avoiding unnecessary spending.
